body_html:
Another advantage of having BoolTensor is that it enables efficient implementation of binary neural networks. Currently, one should use a ByteTensor to implement such networks. As a result, different bit-wise operations such as AND, OR, and XOR are performed on eight bits rather than a single bit. Additionally, the memory consumption will be eight times what it needs to be.

Because binary neural networks may have a better memory/energy efficiency, they are suitable for energy-constrained platforms like smartphones. Since ONNX supports Boolean tensors, it may be a good idea to introduce BoolTensor to allow conversion from PyTorch to ONNX, and later to Caffe2.

Another advantage of having `BoolTensor` is that it enables efficient implementation of binary neural networks. Currently, one should use a `ByteTensor` to implement such networks. As a result, different bit-wise operations such as AND, OR, and XOR are performed on eight bits rather than a single bit. Additionally, the memory consumption will be eight times what it needs to be.

Because binary neural networks may have a better memory/energy efficiency, they are suitable for energy-constrained platforms like smartphones. Since ONNX supports Boolean tensors, it may be a good idea to introduce BoolTensor to allow conversion from PyTorch to ONNX, and later to Caffe2.
